doc:
Shari Headley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shari_Headley 0 Shari Headley (born July 15, 1963) is an American actress and former model. Headley is best known for her role as Lisa McDowell in the 1988 box-office hit romantic comedy film, Coming to America. Headley also has appeared in films The Preacher's Wife (1996) and Johnson Family Vacation (2004). On television, Headley starred as Det. Mimi Reed in the ABC daytime soap opera, All My Children on a regular basis from 1991 to 1994. As lead actress, she starred in the Fox short-lived drama series, 413 Hope St. (1997-1998), for which she received NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actress in a Drama Series nomination. In 2014, Headley began starring as villainous Jennifer Sallison in the Oprah Winfrey Network primetime soap opera, The Haves and the Have Nots. Shari_Headley ( born July_15_,_1963 ) is an_American_actress and former_model . Headley is_best_known for her_role as Lisa_McDowell in the_1988_box-office hit romantic_comedy_film , Coming to America . Headley also has_appeared in films The_Preacher 's_Wife_(_1996_)_and_Johnson_Family_Vacation_(_2004_) . On television , Headley starred as Det._Mimi_Reed in the_ABC_daytime_soap_opera , All_My_Children on a_regular_basis from 1991 to 1994 . As lead_actress , she starred in the_Fox_short-lived_drama_series , 413_Hope_St._(_1997-1998_) , for which she received NAACP_Image_Award for Outstanding_Actress in a_Drama_Series_nomination . In 2014 , Headley began_starring as villainous_Jennifer_Sallison in the_Oprah_Winfrey_Network_primetime_soap_opera , The_Haves and the_Have_Nots .
